function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of integration of blockchain technology with ethical data standards may compromise user privacy protection and lead to ethical concerns.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges in secure tracking of learning process and verifying student credentials leading to potential data security threats","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on world economy and businesses due to lockdowns and social distancing, with the challenge of time-consuming paper-based loan processes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Necessity for continuous and automated surveillance to monitor covid-19 symptoms and transmission rates","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Patient data privacy violation through unsecured data sharing","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data forging and mutation in medical iot devices","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unavailability of secure and reliable data sharing in education sector","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Loss of data security and privacy in centralized cloud storage for contact tracing data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining a new working environment with social distancing and minimal physical contact.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption in the global supply chain for medical equipment and pharmaceuticals.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of secure health record database","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient healthcare management system","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of inaccurate data on social platforms causing panic and fear.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unsafe and unsecure movement of healthcare instruments during the pandemic.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective monitoring of quarantine cases and slow drug supply.","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using blockchain technology for tracking covid-19 infections among humans","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Supply chain transparency using blockchain technology","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of data accuracy and integrity in disease surveillance","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of vaccine information modification","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of traceability and verification in donation process","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combining blockchain technology with ai and gis for public surveillance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Slowdown of the global economy due to shutdown of various sectors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Tracking sensitive medical data on a public blockchain","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on blockchain for public surveillance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential security breaches in blockchain technology leading to unauthorized access to patient data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete data collection from blockchain participating nodes.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Blockchain technology deployment challenges and integration complexities within healthcare systems.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate and untrustworthy data from existing technologies may lead to incorrect information about the spread of the coronavirus.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse or mismanagement of blockchain technology may lead to security breaches or data manipulation, compromising the integrity of the data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on multiple technologies such as biosensors, 3d scanning, and multi-agent systems may introduce compatibility issues and data integration challenges.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of critical reflections on the importance of cities and how they are governed","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to rally support for transformative actions towards addressing threats like climate change","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of disclosure of competing financial interests or personal relationships","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive research on urban design and environmental factors","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Context-specific impacts of the pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for ongoing reviews and updates in pandemic research","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The pandemic has exposed old socioeconomic inequalities that exist in cities, threatening public health by making it difficult to enforce protective measures such as social distancing.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public transportation has been severely affected during the pandemic, leading to increased use of private vehicles as a safer alternative and potentially posing threats to achieving sustainable development.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on urban areas","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imbalanced coverage of major impact themes","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in impact and response mechanisms across contexts","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of empirical evidence on the effects of urban design on covid-19 spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Debate on the link between covid-19 prevalence and urban design characteristics","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Advocacy for compact urban development without clear evidence on its impact on disease spread","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased density enabling transmission of infectious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited access to resources in peri-urban and suburban areas","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Connectivity as a risk factor for disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconclusive evidence on the association between population density and covid-19 transmission rates","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Positive relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in high-density areas","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative relationship between population density and covid-19 transmission rates in certain phases of the epidemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
